from sortedcontainers import *
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        sl = SortedList()
        mp = dict()
        for i in range(n-1):
            mp[i] = i+1
            sl.add(i)
        ans = []
        for u, v in queries:
            idx = sl.bisect_left(u)
            if idx >= len(sl) or sl[idx] != u: 
                ans.append(len(sl))
                continue
            while mp[sl[idx]] < v:
                sl.remove(sl[idx])
            sl.remove(sl[idx])
            mp[u] = v 
            sl.add(u)
            # print(idx,sl,mp)
            ans.append(len(sl))
        return ans
